She Loves Us

The land loves us back. She loves us with beans and tomatoes, with roasting ears and blackberries and birdsongs. By a shower of gifts and a heavy rain of lessons. She provides for us and teaches us to provide for ourselves. Thatâ€™s what good mothers do.

Author: Robin Wall Kimmerer

Sources: Braiding Sweetgrass
